entry.title: IM
entry.content:
Part of the journey is the end.

LoveU3000 â†click here to watch a marvelous video.

Lines

Trailer

Gosh seems like thousand years ago.

I fought my way out of the cave, became iron man.

Realized I loved you.

I know I said no more surprises, but I was really hoping to pull off the one last one.

Avengersï¼šEndgame

This thing on? Hey, Miss Potts. Pep.

If you find this recording, donâ€™t post it on social media. Itâ€™s gonna be a real tearjerker.

I donâ€™t know if youâ€™re ever gonna see these. I donâ€™t even know if youâ€™re still â€¦ Oh, God, I hope so.

Todayâ€™s day 21. No, 22.

You know, if it wasnâ€™t for the existential terror of staring into the literal void of space, Iâ€™d say Iâ€™m feeling a little better today.

Infectionâ€™s run its course, thanks to the Blue Meanie back there.

Youâ€™d love her. Very practical. Only a tiny bit sadistic.

So, the fuel cells were cracked during battle and we figured out a way to reverse the ion charge and bought ourselves about 48 hours of flight time.

But itâ€™s now dead in the water. Thousand light years from the nearest 7-Eleven.

Oxygen will run out tomorrow morning and thatâ€™ll be it.

Pep, I know I said no more surprises but I gotta say I was really hoping to pull off one last one.

But it looks like â€¦ Well, you know what it looks like.

Donâ€™t feel bad about this. I mean, actually, if you grovel for a couple weeks and then move on with enormous guilt.

I should probably lie down for a minute. Go rest my eyes.

Please know, when I drift off, itâ€™ll be like every night lately.

Iâ€™m fine. Totally fine. I dream about you. Because itâ€™s always you.

No amount of money ever bought a second of time.

Everybody wants a happy ending, right? But it doesnâ€™t always roll that way. Maybe this time.

Iâ€™m hoping if you play this back, itâ€™s in celebration.

I hope families are reunited. I hope we get it back.

And something like a normal version of the planet has been restored.

If there ever was such a thing. God, what a world. Universe, now.

If you told me 10 years ago that we werenâ€™t alone, let alone to this extent, I mean, I wouldnâ€™t have been surprised, but come on, who knew?

The epic forces of darkness and light that have come into play.

And for better or worse, thatâ€™s the reality Morganâ€™s gonna have to find a way to grow up in.

So, I thought Iâ€™d probably better record a little greeting in the case of an untimely death. On my part. Not that death at any time isnâ€™t untimely.

This time travel thing that weâ€™re gonna try and pull off tomorrow, itâ€™s got me scratching my head about the survivability of it all. Thatâ€™s the thing.

Then again, thatâ€™s the hero gig, right?

Part of the journey is the end.

What am I even tripping for?

Everything is gonna work out exactly the way itâ€™s supposed to.

I love you 3000.
